text: Rafael "Hideo" Suzuki (born August 13, 1987 in São Paulo, Brazil) is a Brazilian racing driver. He has competed in several Formula Three series before the All-Japan Formula Three Championship, such as the South American, Asian and the German Formula Three Championship. == Career == === 1998 - Go- Kart === After a few indoor go-kart races, Rafael Suzuki started to compete at the age of 10 in 1998, and soon went to some wins and titles, building a successful career. ==Racing record== ===Career summary=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align:center" !
